abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports that opioids were responsible for 28,647 out of 47,055 drug overdose deaths in 2014, or 60.9 percent of total; rate rose by 15.6 percent between 2014 and 2015.

headline.main: Opioids Contribute to a Rising Death Toll: 28,647 in 2014

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Fatal drug overdoses have nearly tripled over the past few years, largely because of opioid abuse, the C.D.C. has found....
lead_paragraph: Fatal drug overdoses have nearly tripled over the past few years, largely because of opioid abuse, the C.D.C. has found.
